Name: Simple Builder
About the game: Simple Builder is basically exactly what it's name is a simple building game. You can build a large number of structures and/or large ones and have five save locations to try out. Use foundations to start a building then add pillars in areas you wish to put walls and other features. As you build more in each save location your gathering range increases. You can also right click to destroy building pieces.
